Text: LOVE this series, hate peter parker.

im lucky enough to be in texas, to welcome our new superhero. i was shocked they thought to put one around here. im lovin this book so far too, its a pretty refreshing change. like taking away damian waynes experiences and replacing them with black and red big boy pants
Can't say I hate Peter Parker but it's nice to read a comic that's not set in New York starring an edgier less loud-mouthed Parker clone. Thanks for the up!
